6.67: Reduced  Ravage travel speed from 2000 to 900.
6.00: Gush now damages the target as the projectile hits, instead of instantly damaging.
6.83b: Reduced  Anchor Smash radius from 400 to 375.
6.50: Recoded  Ravage: No longer turns hit enemies invulnerable during the air time. No longer causes hit enemy units to instantly face towards Tidehunter. No longer conflicts with  Earth Spike,  Impale,  Burrowstrike and with multiple Ravages. No longer fails to stun and damage enemies when some of the spikes were at a cliff. Increased stun duration from 1.72/2.02/2.32 to 2.02/2.32/2.77.
6.31: Ravage Reduced damage from 250/350/500 to 200/300/400. Increased stun duration from 1.52 to 1.92/2.32/2.72.
6.32: Ravage Increased damage from 200/300/400 to 250/350/450. Reduced stun duration from 1.92/2.32/2.72 to 1.72/2.02/2.32.
6.35: Increased base armor from 0 to 1 (total armor is now 2.1).
6.39: Kraken Shell Increased damage block from 5/10/15/20 to 7/14/21/28. Now removes debuffs every 11/10/9/8 seconds, instead of randomly.
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.79: Increased  Kraken Shell damage block from 7/14/21/28 to 9/18/27/36.
6.51: Fixed  Ravage affecting Juggernaut during  Blade Fury. Fixed a bug between  Voodoo Restoration and Ravage.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Reduced  Ravage travel speed from 900 to 775.
6.17: Rescaled  Gush manacost from 75/90/105/120 to 100 on each level.
6.71: Increased  Anchor Smash proc chance from 20% to 25%.
6.72: Increased attack range from 100 to 128. Reworked  Anchor Smash.
5.75: Gush Increased movement speed slow from 25% to 50%. Incresed slow duration from 2.5 to 4.5. Increased  Kraken Shell damage block from 10/15/20/25 to 10/20/30/40.  Anchor Smash Reduced proc chance from 20%/30%/40%/50% to 20% on each level. Increased damage from 50 to 50/75/105/140. Reduced Rain of Tears radius from global to 2500.
5.76: Increased  Anchor Smash damage from 50/75/105/140 to 75/115/155/200. Replaced Rain of Tears with  Ravage.
5.77: Ravage Reduced damage from 300/400/500 to 250/350/500. Reduced stun duration from 1.52/2.02/2.52 to 1.52 on each level.
6.80: Kraken Shell Reduced debuff damage threshold from 600 taken to 600/550/500/450. Increased damage block from 9/18/27/36 to 10/20/30/40.
6.81: Anchor Smash Increased attack damage reduction from 40 to 60%. Now fully affects ancient creeps (still does not affect Roshan).
6.82: Reduced  Anchor Smash attack damage reduction from 60% to 45%/50%/55%/60%.
6.83: Reduced movement speed from 310 to 305. Reduced  Ravage damage from 200/325/450 to 200/290/380.
6.84: Increased  Kraken Shell damage block from 10/20/30/40 to 12/24/36/48.  Anchor Smash damage is no longer reduced by Damage Block.  Ravage no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes.
5.80: Gush Reduced slow from 50% to 40%. Reduced debuff duration from 4.5 to 4.
6.20: Kraken Shell Reduced damage block from 10/20/30/40 to 5/10/15/20. Now also reduces damage from ranged attacks. Increased  Gush manacost from 100 to 120.
